translations: v.窥探（pry 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Imelda might think she was prying.
sentences.translation: 伊梅尔达可能认为她在窥探。

sentences.sentence: I'm sick of you prying into my personal life!
sentences.translation: 我讨厌你刺探我的私生活！

sentences.sentence: We do not want people prying into our affairs.
sentences.translation: 我们不想让人刺探我们的私事。
